patterns.component_pattern: Named exports only (no default exports), 'use client' when using hooks/browser APIs
patterns.shadcn_pattern: shadcn/ui components extend native HTML elements with Tailwind classes using cn() utility
patterns.icon_pattern: lucide-react icons imported as named imports (e.g., import { Eye, EyeOff } from 'lucide-react')
patterns.test_pattern: Vitest with React Testing Library for component tests, Playwright for E2E tests
patterns.e2e_pattern: Use page.getByLabel() and page.getByRole() as primary query strategies

existing_implementations.description: Password fields currently use basic shadcn Input component with type='password'
